constituent: recess, tongue, thousand, mouth, nose, drop, eye, heart
heisigStory: Tongue . . . nose . . . heart. The sense of breath from the last frame should not be used; it could lead you to put only the nose over the heart and leave the tongue off to one side.
koohiiStory1: Recess to me is a school break. At recess some kiddies are comparing their latest body piercings. Tongues and noses are nothing special. The new cool is to have your heart done!
koohiiStory2: Ah recess; tongues slandering, noses being turned up, and beneath it all, young hearts being broken. Dominant in playgrounds is the noise of tongues, which helps me remember that in this kanji tongue comes first.
myStory: sao lãng. nghỉ ngơi. lưỡi thở
readingExamples: 憩い (いこ.い), 憩う (いこ.う)
words: 休憩(きゅうけい): rest, break, recess, intermission
